resources.string: No new images have been found in the selected folder.
New folder has been added to the gallery.
Access to the camera is required for taking pictures using the app.
Access to the multimedia is required for reading and saving the images on the device.
In settings set the required resolution.
To get it go to the app settings.
Image has not been saved. Check the remaining storage of the device.
Image has not been saved. Check the folder where it should be saved.
Find the file with "ttf" or "otf" extension (There\'\s .ttf or .otf at the end of the file name.)
New font has not been added. Perhaps the name is already in use.
File should be with "ttf" or "otf" extension (There\'\s .ttf or .otf at the end of the file name)
Font has been added. Find it in the list.
Additional fonts haven\'\t been found. Download the fonts with .ttf or .otf extension and add them.
Select the point on filled and non-transparent area of the drawing.
Open it? Otherwise it will be deleted.
View the images, pressing and holding on one of them opens the additional actions. Go back using this button.
Files are deleted from physical media
